subject: Football
Fines (Penalties)
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: The new rule is intended to encourage coaches to teach the proper technique to avoid the kind of hits to the head and neck area that the N.F.L. cracked down on last season.
snippet: The new rule is intended to encourage coaches to teach the proper technique to avoid the kind of hits to the head and neck area that the N.F.L. cracked down on last season.
